about_the_game:
(DIS)ASSEMBLE!

In this puzzle game, each character has unique but limited abilities.

Combine Characters

Each Cube can perform some actions, such as walking vertically, and pressing buttons, the Cylinders also have unique abilities. By assembling them, it is possible to have access to the combination of their abilities!

Think in Different Directions

Walk, join, push, disassemble, test different combinations to achieve new results. Together they are stronger, but apart they can be in more than one place at the same time. Use it in your favor.

Main Features


  • Challenging but satisfying puzzles
  • Unique character assembling mechanic
  • Contrast, cute and colorful visuals
  • Play alone or with a friend in co-op mode
